TopicTitle: [1.3.X - 1.6.X] Speed Unit Changer - More units for your speed - Ap & Pe on your Navball

Articles.Content:
Are you used to different speed units like km/h or mph? Then Speed unit changer is for you!

Speed Unit Changer, a simple plugin to visualize current speed in different units.

With version 1.7.1 you can display speed on these units on your navball:

- meters / second

- kilometers / hour

- miles / hour

- feet / second

- Knots

- Mach number

And also on navball, you can now display:

- AGL or Altitude Ground Level based on your center of mass on these units:

  • Meters
  • Kilometers
  • Miles
  • Nautical miles
  • Feet

- Apoapsis & Periapsis (if Periapsis is negative, only Apoapsis is shown).

  • Now with a toggle for not showing speed on orbital mode!

- Target Name
